title: RL Outcome Schema
description: Schema for reinforcement learning outcomes in the BHIV system

outcomeId.description: Unique identifier for the RL outcome

taskId.description: Identifier for the task this outcome relates to

agentSelected.description: Name of the agent selected by RL

modelSelected.description: Name of the model selected by RL

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the outcome was recorded

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the RL outcome

context.description: Context used for the RL decision

features.description: Features used in the RL decision
